2.text: You can’t travel but you can dream! Ask your teen these questions

14.text: Where do you want to travel? How long will you be away? What will you pack? What will you do? What will you see ?

39.text: Look at a map together if you have one.

48.text: Choose a country that they’ve never heard of and look it up together online.

609.text: This game can be played in pairs or even as a group

621.text: Stand facing each other or in a circle

631.text: One person leads first while everyone else must copy, trying to move exactly at the same time as the leader.

651.text: Make sure the leader moves slowly enough for everyone to follow! Explore moving different body parts and in different levels.

671.text: After a while, switch who is leading. Give everyone a chance to lead

969.text: Millions of families are struggling to make ends meet during COVID-19. When money is tight, this can make us feel anxious, stressed, and sad. How we understand and talk about money is important. We can also learn about how we can save in ways that will benefit the family.

1298.text: Household chores aren’t fun… or are they? You can make them into a game, like this.

1387.text: Hello! How are you feeling? If you are feeling overwhelmed or stressed, here is a short activity that can help when you are feeling like needing some more support to get through the day.

1421.text: Recognise what is happening for you in this moment. What are you thinking? Are your thoughts positive or negative. How do you feel? Do you feel pleasant or unpleasant? How does your body feel? Do you feel tense or relaxed?

1462.text: Sit comfortably and close your eyes. Connect to your heart in a kind and gentle way. You may want to place one hand on your heart or chest. Say the following words silently to yourself:

1501.text: May there be love in my family.

1524.text: Before you open your eyes, take a moment to reflect on your experience. Notice if you feel any different.

1543.text: Here is a link other support that may help you cope with any stress or other emotional difficulties that you may be experiencing. If you ever need this link, type "Help". Chat to you later!

1578.text: *Referral to local mental health services hotline in country*

1590.text: Sit down and close your eyes

1596.text: Listen to your breath as it goes in and out.

1612.text: Take a few more deep breaths.

1618.text: When you are ready open your eyes again. Do you feel any different?

1638.text: Would you like an activity for
